audioText: Mettez votre signature en bas de chaque page du contrat.
question: Where should you put your signature?
options: At the bottom of each page of the contract
Only on the first page of the contract
At the top of each page of the contract
Only on the last page of the contract
explanation: The instruction says 'Mettez votre signature en bas de chaque page du contrat' - Put your signature at the bottom of each page of the contract. 'Mettez' is the 2nd person plural imperative form of 'mettre' (to put).
